package org.mule.providers.legstar.test.jvmquery;
import org.mule.providers.legstar.transformers.AbstractJavaToHostMuleTransformer;
import com.legstar.xsdc.test.cases.jvmquery.JVMQueryRequest;
import com.legstar.test.coxb.jvmquery.bind.JvmQueryRequestTransformers;

/**
 * JVMQueryRequest to Host Byte Array Mule Transformer.
 * <p/>
 * <code>JvmQueryRequestToHostMuleTransformer</code> takes a JVMQueryRequest object as input
 * and turns it into a byte array in host format (EBCDIC), ready
 * to be sent to a target Mainframe.
 * <p/> 
 * Class generated by LegStar Mule Component generator.
 */
public class JvmQueryRequestToHostMuleTransformer extends AbstractJavaToHostMuleTransformer {

    /**
     * Constructs the transformer. Source is a JVMQueryRequest object and result
     * will be a byte array.
     */
    public JvmQueryRequestToHostMuleTransformer() {
        super(new JvmQueryRequestTransformers());
        registerSourceType(JVMQueryRequest.class);
    }


}
